'''Cooked chicken'''{{efn|Also known as '''roast chicken''' in [[Languages#Differences between English variants|British and New Zealand English]].}} is a [[food]] item that is obtained by [[cooking]] [[raw chicken]].

== Obtaining ==
{{see also|Tutorial:Animal farming|title1=Animal farming}}

=== Mob loot ===
{{Drop sources|Cooked Chicken}}

=== Generated loot ===
{{LootChestItem|cooked-chicken}}

=== Cooking ===
{{Smelting
|Raw Chicken
|Cooked Chicken
|0,35
}}

=== Trading ===
{{Trade sources}}

=== Villager gifts ===
Butcher villagers may give cooked chicken to players with the [[Hero of the Village]] effect.{{only|java}}

== Usage ==
=== Food ===
{{see also|Tutorial:Hunger management|title1=Hunger management}}

To eat cooked chicken, press and hold {{control|use}} while it is selected in the hotbar. Eating one restores {{hunger|6}} [[hunger]] and 7.2 hunger [[Hunger#Mechanics|saturation]].

=== Wolves ===
Cooked chicken can be used to [[breed]] and heal tamed [[wolves]], lead them around, and make baby tamed wolves grow up faster by 10% of the remaining time.
